answers.answer: You only get 2 unless you have like diabetes or something or if they find something wrong with the baby

Ive always got 3 with every pregnancy....1 to co firm pregnancy and another for find out gender and check bby parts n growth n the last one to in 3rd trimester to make sure bby head down n everything is ready for delivery
Yes^^  depends  on your doctor I asked how many will I get she said 3 max I was very upset .
I had 3 already i switch doctors and now i get one every 3 weeks i go im 20 weeks

it really depends on your doctor and depends if the doctors office you go to has ultrasound tak and room there.. I'm 17w.. no problems an I have had 3 .. getting my 4th  (anatomy) ultra sound in under 2weeks
I've had 5 done.. it depends on your doctor and how many your insurance covers.. or if they suspect something is up with the baby.

I had 3 so far i switch doctors so i get 1 every 3 weeks i go in i rather see and hear my baby heart beat then just the heart beat gives me joy but it up to the Doctor but i love my new doctor im 21 weeks & 2 days

question: How many ultrasounds are you supposed to have during pregnancy. I've only had 2 one at 10weeks and another at 20.
title: How many ultrasounds??
